column4: hello, has anyone gotten ubuntu to run in qemu? i am getting an error dealing with the cdrom. I am running ubuntu 7.10 as host and  trying 7.10 as guest.
both versions are free to use, and one of them is open source.
if you are just starting with virtualization I agree with Fryguy-- and xtknight, use virtualbox.
i choose qemu because i know it from windows
